Reviews.Title: VideoSecu video capture card
Reviews.Author: kenneth surber
Reviews.Content: The windows driver would not load making the card useless.  The card fits into the PCI slot at an angle with the front of the card not inserting fully into the slot as the mounting bracket appears to be short.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel CCTV Security Surveillance System DVR PCI Video Capture Card
Full remote capabilities (PSTN, ISDN & LAN network)
Input Connector: BNC
TV System: NTSC standard
Recording and display rate 30 FPS
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel Camera Digital Video Recorder DVR System Card 1HH
